column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It was a weekday and I was mentally drained from work
column2: so when my friend initially asked me to grab dinner my answer was 'no'. But then she offered to get my first cocktail and told me it was a ramen spot that I could review. Honestly
column3: she had me in the palm of her hand when she offered to get my first cocktail. (I know
column4: it doesn't take much. I'm slightly ashamed - well
column5: not really.) This was my first time trying Ramen. I mean I've had that kind from the grocery store that cost a mere $.30
column6: but never had I been to an actual ramen restaurant. Here's my first encounter with Jinya Ramen Bar.
